channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: ‘Over-evacuation’ may have prompted traffic problems before tsunami hit Hawaii, officials say
item.description: Hawaii officials say the timing of the tsunami warning and evacuation orders following this week’s massive earthquake off Russia helped make for severe traffic congestion in some areas.

item.title: Brown University strikes agreement with Trump administration to restore lost federal funding
Arkansas teacher charged with killing couple who were hiking in Devil’s Den with their kids
